Header: Dimbulagala Students Gifted with School Accessories
Content: 170 students of low income families in Polonnaruwa, thanks to an initiative taken by Major General H. J Senaviratne, Commandant, Maduruoya Army Training School (ATS) in coordination with a group of his Colombo-based friends, received school accessories, uniforms, water bottles, shoes, and books free as incentives for studies. Distribution ceremony, headed by the ATS Commandant and a representative gathering of those donors took place at Dimbulagala Kajuwaththa Vidyalaya on Thursday (29) in the presence of teachers, parents and beneficiaries who have been selected on the recommendation of respective teachers.
